name: Mastermind Pro - Code Breaker
description:
Guess the secret code in this classic game of pure logic and deduction.

Mastermind Pro is the classic board game revisited for modern devices.
The goal of the game is to guess the secret code in a limited number of tries following the hints given after each try.
You can challenge yourself or your friends on Game Center.

• 4 game modes
• Game Center leaderboards and challenges
• gorgeous graphics
• colorblind support

This game is ads supported. If you want an ads free game download the paid version.
